extendedInfo.description: If you love Windows Media Center youâll REALLY love My Media Center.  Manage and control your Media Center experience from your Android device, whether youâre inside or outside the house. Recorded TV, scheduled recordings, movies, universal search, remote control, and so much more the Ultimate Windows Media Center app is here.Requires My Media Center Services (free!) to be installed on your Windows 7 or 8 PC running Windows Media Center. Please visit http://www.CetonCorp.com/MyMediaCenterTop Features:â¢TV and Movie GalleryForget hopping around from the TV section to the movie section to your recorded shows.  My Media Center lets you see an integrated view of all your shows and movies in one place.â¢Manage and Schedule DVR RecordingsAt work and forgot to record that show tonight?  See a season premier promo that you want to record but youâre away from home on a trip?  Donât worry, weâve got you covered.â¢Universal SearchItâs TV search the way it should be.  You probably donât care whether your favorite show or movie is on one channel or another, in your personal library or airing later this week.  Weâll help you easily find what youâre looking wherever itâs playing. â¢Play To any TV SetBrowse your TV and movie libraries, select the show you want to watch, and choose the device on which you want to watch.  You donât even have to be in the same room.â¢Your Mobile is the RemoteMy Media Center includes full remote control capabilities for both your media center PC and any Ceton Echo extenders or Xbox 360 you have.  Play, pause, fast forward, rewind, channel, volume â¦ itâs all there in one pretty slick touchscreen view.â¢Works with Any Tuner on any Windows Media Center PC!My Media Center â The Ultimate Windows Media Center AppPress Reviews:- "Pretty cool!" "Simple setup." "A full blown remote control thatâs perfect for media center" "This is 5 bucks you should spend!" - HD Nation"...without question a must-have app" "...greatly improves the Windows Media Center experience." â PC World"For Windows Media Center fans searching for a good looking remote app for their mobile devices, that wait is over" - Engadget"it is hard to think of a reason why you will not like it" - WPCentralFull Feature List:â¢ Universal search across all of your contentâ¢ Manage Recorded TVâ¢ Start Playback of Recorded TV on HTPC or Extenderâ¢ Manage Scheduled Recordingsâ¢ Manage Series Recordingsâ¢ Browse Program Grid Guideâ¢ Tune channel on HTPC or Extenderâ¢ Use On Screen Remote Control to control HTPC or Extenderâ¢ Automatically generate local movie metadata & cover artâ¢ Browser recorded & local movies in a beautiful galleryâ¢ Start playback of movies on HTPC or Extenderâ¢ Browse list of movies on television tonight with cover artâ¢ Easily browse upcoming Premieres in one nice listâ¢ Browse recent activity on your HTPCâ¢ Control Extendersâ¢ Wake on LANâ¢ Much MoreIf you have any issue please contact us on our official forums: http://www.thegreenbutton.tv/forums/viewforum.php?f=63*My Media Center does NOT stream recorded or live TV to your android device. My Media Center does allow you to start playback on any HTPC/Extender, schedule recordings, manage recordings, etc.For more information see the official website: http://www.cetoncorp.com/mymediacenter or follow us on twitter http://www.twitter.com/CetonMyMCKeywords:Windows Media Center, Media Center, WMC, WME, Ceton, Ceton Companion

reviews.title: Ok but basic
reviews.comment: With a  little help fom customer svc got it working. Wanted to easily send shows to different extenders for sports bar. Remote piece works well but guide/search is missing standard features. Can\'t set up faves or limit searches to channels you actually have. So scrolling through guide or looking for a movie can take much longer than it should.
reviews.author: Rebecca Onuschak

reviews.title: Good but could be better
reviews.comment: I enjoy the features that this app provides.  The remote is decent, the guide is easy to navigate, and scheduling recordings is a breeze.  However, the lack of a streaming recorded TV to a mobile device is becoming a serious drawback.  I have had my infinitv4 over 2 years and it feels like the whole home DVRs available from satellite providers and other cable providers now have more advanced features including streaming.  I am hoping this is added soon or any number of Echos  won\'t keep me a customer.
reviews.author: Jeff Gibson

reviews.title: Get it together Ceton
reviews.comment: Worst remote app I\'ve used to date. I rarely even open this app because it has so many bugs. It\'s crashed wmc more times than I can remember. When it does work, it often takes multiple attempts to actually send the intended command.  The only thing it does reliably is schedule recordings. Not to mention they still haven\'t made good on features that were supposed to work @ launch nearly nine months ago. I own the iOS version as well and is just as terrible.
reviews.author: Kory Langner

reviews.title: Solid app for wmc users
reviews.comment: Not fancy but nice overall. Interface works well on my galaxy s4 and 10in tablet. Guides on Ceton site answer most questions and complains on play reviews
reviews.author: Brandon Culver

reviews.title: Wish I could get my money back
reviews.comment: No wake on lan from within the lan.  Also the fact that I cant play my content to the tablet with this  app still just points to how far behind it is.  Also my tuner card is always having issues.
reviews.author: Paul Bussman

reviews.title: good app but...
reviews.comment: Most of my movies do not show, each folder contains mymovies.xml...what more do you need? i bought media center control instead which shows all movies in correct categories with no problems, i really expected more from ceton because i have their cable card and i love it.
reviews.author: Przemyslaw Tyrtania

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Wake on LAN functionality doesn\'t work over WAN. I can do a wake on LAN  over WAN using other programs, so the bug is with the My Media Center program.  On two different devices (a Nexus 10 and a Verizon GS3), the guide never loads, just says it can\'t connect. Really bad for a $5 app. Did they even test this thing?
reviews.author: Daniel Thompson

reviews.title: Great app!!  To get 5 stars, please add one touch Record to Guide
reviews.comment: There are simply way too many actions required to record a program and return to the guide.  I want to stay on the guide and record from there.  Thanks!
reviews.author: Bob Anderson

reviews.title: This is \"My Other Remote\"
reviews.comment: As an early adopter of MCE on XP, this app has become an extension of my remote capability for everything from my HTPC to extenders.  CETON, keep up the fight, don\'t let WMC die!  I\'ll buy CETON ECHOs any day over a new XBOX!
reviews.author: Jason Brannon

reviews.title: Great, but could use a few things
reviews.comment: Better than most of the remote potato I\'ve tried. Wish it had an expandable notification displaying what\'s playing with option to record show or series. Also widgets would be a nice addition
reviews.author: Tom LeJeune

reviews.title: Bugs
reviews.comment: Just to many bugs.
reviews.author: Michael Foutz

reviews.title: Lost functionality over time
reviews.comment: The first release of this application allowed you to easily see upcoming movies that were airing soon and schedule their recording. This newer release only shows you movies airing the same night.  Upcoming releases are shown only as useless links to Amazon where you can purchase new releases. Totally lame!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Guide doesn\'t load anymore
reviews.comment: Newest update killed guide from displaying.  Needs to be fixed for better review.
reviews.author: Joshua Baptiste

reviews.title: No remote access
reviews.comment: Can only be used remotley with a static ip even though it states dns supported Additionally no customer service
reviews.author: damian ogrady

reviews.title: Streaming gets you a fifth star!
reviews.comment: Great app. Remote super responsive. Async recorded TV loading is frustrating...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Works great now
reviews.comment: Had a rocky start, but this app is almost fully working. They\'ve done tons of bug fixes over the last year and have made it into a great app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Must have tool for media center users
reviews.comment: This is a must-have tool to manage your media center setup when you are away from your HTPC, either away from your house or when you don\'t want to power up your TV.  In some ways, it\'s easier than using the remote with the 10 foot interface.
reviews.author: Phil Seastrand

reviews.title: The perfect Media Center app!
reviews.comment: This app is the perfect update to the Media Center experience.  I can peruse my TV recordings and movies without having to disturb the current view.  From there I can decide to record a show, watch a show, watch a movie and control it all with a graphic on screen remote control.  Inherently (some setup required), I can schedule shows from afar and also see what movies are on that night.  There are many features I didn\'t mention and many features being added and well worth the price.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not just for Ceton users!  A must have.
reviews.comment: I am a huge media center user, and this program is a godsend.  It works with non-Ceton extenders as well.  Takes a long time with a large video library (mine is 20 TB or so) but you certainly can\'t blame it for that.
reviews.author: David Petzinger

reviews.title: Good app needs a few extra things
reviews.comment: First off, good work on the app. Nice design, clean interface well laid out. A few things I would like to see that I know XBMC remotes have so I am not sure if these can be implemented (not marking down because these aren\'t in the app) Now playing needs to be in there, would be great if it was something like Yatse with a widget as well, No Music library, this really needs to be added. TV that I have in my library (I did see this was in the client so very much looking forward to this). Streaming of content would also be a great addition. Remote needs to be in a light theme as it\'s dark theme is an exact opposite of the rest of the app.All in all the best WMC app out there at the moment.
reviews.author: Matthew Cline
